name: express-validator-helper
description: simple express-validator wrapper for easier work with validation error handling

scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks --reporter dot test/
scripts.test-travis: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks --reporter spec test/

author: Svyatoslav Bulbakha <mail@ssbb.me> (http://ssbb.me)
